mapper.select:
select uwi.id, uwi.user_id, uwi.index_no, uwi.school_id, uwi.discipline_id, uwi.status, ss.name as schoolName, ss.area, ss.manage, ss.`level`, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card, ui.`type`, ui.sex, ui.images, di.name as disciplineName, di.employment from user_wish_info uwi left join discipline_info di on (di.id = uwi.discipline_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = uwi.user_id) left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = uwi.school_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userWishInfo.userName},'%')
AND ss.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userWishInfo.schoolName},'%')
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userWishInfo.schoolName},'%')
AND uwi.status = #{userWishInfo.status}
order by uwi.user_id, uwi.index_no desc
